official_title: A bill to provide that reasonable charge determinations under part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act for services provided in the State of Michigan shall be determined on a State-wide basis.

summary.text: Provides that under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act prevailing charge levels, as applicable to items and services furnished in Michigan, shall be determined on a statewide basis and not on the basis of any particular locality within the State.

titles.title: A bill to provide that reasonable charge determinations under part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act for services provided in the State of Michigan shall be determined on a State-wide basis.
